title: Gary Ginsberg: "First Friends"
description: Michael sits down with Gary Ginsberg, author of "First Friends: The Powerful, Unsung (And Unelected) People Who Shaped Our Presidents." Original air date 19 August 2021. The book was published on 6 July 2021.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Gary Ginsberg)
